ygData.subject: Re: Pottery Skill, to Rokenn Swiftsong (was re: Forage  Skill)
ygData.msgSnippet: ack, what was i thinking? =) my clay jar keeps it much fresher, how s that? Shada
ygData.messageBody:
ack, what was i thinking? =)

my clay jar keeps it much fresher, how's that?

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:15 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Pottery Skill, to Rokenn Swiftsong (was re:
> Forage Skill)
>
>
> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> At 01:13 PM 6/30/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> >what can someone with a master pottery skill make? i had a
> friend who was
> >messing around with it make a medium clay jar, which i use
> to keep my food
> >in under the rumor that it degenerates slower. can larger
> jars be made? my
> >medium jar only has four spots.
>
> That's a silly rumour, considering food doesn't rot.
>
> *snicker*
> Talies the Wanderer
